Title: Leaf from Ottoman Diploma in Calligraphy
Medium: ink and pigments on paper mounted on thin pasteboard
Description: This page from Walters manuscript W.674 bears the following inscription: Bi-sm Allah al-Rahman al-Rahim /1/ Qala Rasul Allah sall√° Allah 'alayhi wa-sallama /1/ man kataba /2/ bi-sm Allah al-Rahman al-Rahim wa-jawwadahu fa-lahu al-jannatu sadaqa Habib al-Ilah [sic] /3/.
Keywords: Arabic; Ottoman; Turkish; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Turkey
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Muhammad Hilmi Afandi
